elements.text: You decide to make a hearty vegetable stew for lunch, meaning you have to cut many vegetables. You ask your family for help in the kitchen, but you still end up with a small cut on your finger due to your tremor. Your family runs over to you because they're...

elements.name: Cut Finger_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
